video.title: Parallax Tutorial - Scrolling Effect using CSS and Javascript
video.description:
Learn how to create a Parallax effect using CSS and Javascript. We are going to create two different types of parallax effects.

Tutorial from GTCoding. Check out the GTCoding YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/gtcoding

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org
